title: VIP PPE, Demolition Man Too Real? 5.7.20
itunes:title: VIP PPE, Demolition Man Too Real? 5.7.20
description:
In episode 625, Jack, Miles, and Jamie are joined by The Black List founder Franklin Leonard to discuss the film trends, the murder of Ahmaud Arbery, Trump not wearing a face mask while visiting a factory, what we learned from the whistleblower from Jared Kushner's coronavirus task force, how venues will be re-opening, Demolition Man, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Ahmaud Arbery: anger mounts over killing of black jogger caught on video
  2. Trump does not wear coronavirus mask at Honeywell factory that makes masks
  3. Kushner coronavirus effort said to be hampered by inexperienced volunteers
  4. What will concerts look like after the pandemic? Upcoming show, experts give us ideas
  5. Uh Oh, We’re Inching Towards the ‘Demolition Man’ Future
  6. Demolition Man 2 in the Works at Warner Bros.
  7. Fauci: 'In a perfect world' Americans would stop shaking hands
  8. The Writer of Demolition Man on the Predictive Power of His 1993 Movie
  9. 5 WTF Scenes You Forgot Were In Your Favorite Movies
  10. Sylvestor Stallone On Instagram: Questions and answers
  11. WATCH: Common - Heat (prod. by J Dilla)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
